title: Snow safe
creator_credit: Jack Creswick and Australian Ski Patrol Association
brief_description: A well produced video looking at all aspects of ski and snow safety. Covers appropriate clothing and equipment, selection of equipment, getting proper ski instruction, ski slope courtesy and behaviour, using lifts, ski slope signs, what to do in case of accident or getting lost, care of children, food and hypothermia, and safe tobogganing. Narrated by Debbie Byrne.
